name: Color Gauntlet
description:
In Color Gauntlet you must switch between 4 colors in order to destroy all enemies in the arena. Your color needs to correspond to the enemy's color for them to get hit. You can also use the numbers to switch between colors, I forgot to mention that in the tutorial. Enemies will infinitely grow more difficult with each wave. 

This game was made in around 12 hours for a game jam.
